mapper.sql: id, username, password, salt, real_name as realName, phone, email, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, login_time as loginTime, available
mapper.select: select a.role from sys_role a inner join sys_user_role b ON a.id=b.roleId INNER JOIN sys_user c on c.id=b.userId and c.username = #{username}

select a.permission from sys_permission a INNER JOIN sys_role_permission b on a.id = b.permissionId and b.available='0' and level=2 INNER JOIN sys_user_role c on b.roleId =c.roleId INNER JOIN sys_user d on d.id =c.userId and d.username = #{username}
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_user_role
userId = #{userId} and roleIds = #{roleIds}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user( id, username, password, salt, real_name, phone, email, create_time, update_time, login_time, available ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{realName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{loginTime}, #{available} )
